descriptionHtml:
Sorry I am not good at English.
This is a Mod to add equipment 7bUNPB bodytype.
It does not support the weight slider.
Display can cause confusion because the maximum size other than.


[Location]
There is a box on the qasmoke.
coc qasmoke is recommended.
Or can be manufactured at Dragon category in the Forge.（Advanced Armors is required.）


[Recommended]
7bUNP Female Body Replacer  UNPB TBBP Edition
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56463/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56463/?[/url]


[Required]
XP32 Maximum Skeleton or TBBP Skeleton
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?[/url]

UNP Base body & textures


[Installation]
Unpack the contents to your Skyrim Data folder.


[Uninstallation]
Delete the file of this Mod in the Data folder.


[Licensing/Legal]
Please have freedom as the original policy, when I am diverted enjoy writing credits.


[Change Log]
ver1.2
Added those divided into top and bottom
Added the variation of BodyTights
Added stockings ones of BodyTights
Change UV, the texture of the BodyTights
Remove enchantment
Subtly change the recipe
Change the location of the box

ver1.1
added BodyTights
textures pass fix

ver1.0
Initial release
